testcase.classname: US1001 Kullanici Amazon Sayfasinda arama yapar
testcase.name: TC01 kullanici amazonda kelime aratir
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici amazon anasayfasinda........................................passed Then kullanici Nutella icin arama yapar.....................................passed And sonuclarin Nutella icerdigini test eder.................................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed

testcase.system-out: When kullanici amazon anasayfasinda.........................................passed And kullanici Iphone icin arama yapar.......................................passed Then sonuclarin Iphone icerdigini test eder.................................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed

testcase.classname: US1004 kullanici parametre ile configuration file'i kullanabilmeli
testcase.name: TC07 configuration properties dosyasindan parametre kullanimi
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "techproeducationUrl" sayfasinda............................passed Then kullanici 3 sn bekler..................................................passed And url'in "techpro" icerdigini test eder...................................passed Then sayfayi kapatir........................................................passed
